description:
The gang finds out some upsetting news about Noboru just before his ABC Cup semifinal match against Gao. Angry and confused, Gao gives Noboru a piece of his mind during their heated battle, and we learn how the fighters really feel about each other.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dragons Duel! Journey of the Tiger!
Soshite Tora wa Senri o Kakeru!
そして虎は千里を駆ける!
